attributes.action: An Enlarged dog play area in Chester-le-street.
attributes.additional_details: There are many dogs in Chester-le-street and surrounding areas that walk in Chester-le-street  park, Chester-le-street is a very large community with a very park, there is plenty of room in Chester-le-street park, and there shouldn’t be any problem fitting a larger dog play area in.
attributes.background: In Chester-le-street park, we don’t just want but we need an enlarged dog play area, as the one now is too small, there is a large amount of dogs I see everyday in the park and outside the park. The people I do see with dogs they always complain about the small size of the dog play area.

rejection.details: You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
